divs: sighting detailsduring the evening of 2\21\08 there was a total luma eclipse. at 7:55 i went to the south facing bay window to check the progress of the eclipse, which had just started. out of the right side window of the bay i saw an extremely massive and very fast isososeles triangular craft coming towards me over steele hill from the east. i ran out as fast as i could to the ice covered walkway. at almost over head i locked in on the illuminated areas in the back corners ( see dia.) and then it went behind the pine trees. because of the size and speed i assumed it must be only a few thousand feet. puzzled, i came in and continued watghing tv. at 8:25 i once again checked on the eclipse, which was a little over half, and again a craft came over the hill with the same heading, but a bit to the right. as before i ran out and this time was able to pick on a nose strobe light and maybe, but not sure, one in the interior. just over head before loosing it again in the pines i noticed the the sound, which was that of a multi engine jet, lagged the craft by 2 or 3 body lenths. given this, i figured that it must be at least 20 to 30 thousand feet, making it very very much larger and faster than my earlier estimate. each occurance lasted no more than 5 or 6 seconds. there were no further sightings that night or since. i have often thought about it and it has always bothered me as to just what i had seen that night. i am sure that it must be american man made. i really hope that this somehow leads to answering my questions as to just what i saw that night-- and i am sure of that i saw.
Summary: On the night of 2/21/08 during a total luna eclipse I saw an extremily large and very fast dark isosceles triangular craft coming from the East with illuminated areas in the back corners ( see dia.).
